replies.body: Teamspeak is a voip program like skype that allows you to talk with other people in your channel.
replies.body_tagged: Teamspeak is a voip program like skype that allows you to talk with other people in your channel.

replies.body: A voice-communication software that lets you communicate with other players over voice chat in different channel rooms.
replies.body_tagged: A voice-communication software that lets you communicate with other players over voice chat in different channel rooms.

replies.body: 1. TeamSpeak is proprietary voice-over-Internet Protocol (VoIP) software that allows computer users to speak on a chat channel with fellow computer users, much like a telephone conference call. A TeamSpeak user will often wear a headset with an integrated microphone. ~Definition from Wikipedia
replies.body_tagged: 1. TeamSpeak is proprietary voice-over-Internet Protocol (VoIP) software that allows computer users to speak on a chat channel with fellow computer users, much like a telephone conference call. A TeamSpeak user will often wear a headset with an integrated microphone. ~Definition from Wikipedia

replies.body: The reason why I ask is, I'd have to use it if I make a staff application and it is accepted.
replies.body_tagged: The reason why I ask is, I'd have to use it if I make a staff application and it is accepted.

replies.body:
To make it simple for you, I consider TeamSpeak an alternative to Skype.
It is a place where you can join any channel and talk to people who are in different chats.
If you ever wish to talk to anyone at any time, there will always be friendly players on TeamSpeak willing to start friendly conversations and help you out!
I hope that this cleared it up if you were still confused.

replies.body: I'd personally recommend getting it. It's lots of fun to come on and talk with other players in your game.

replies.body: Zedther Don't spam. I notice you say random stuff like that. SRy for the bump.

replies.body:
Personally, the TeamSpeak community is fantastic.  It's a  new better way to hear constant screaming and yelling.  I'm on it almost 24/7.  

But in all honesty, TS is totally worth it.
